Transformation Matrices and QR Decomposition

Description

The applet illustrates the actions of linear and affine transformations from \( \mathbb{R}^3 \) to \( \mathbb{R}^3 \) and QR Decomposition of the transformation matrix.

Linear Transformation

\( \begin{bmatrix}x\\y\\z\end{bmatrix} \)
